# AutomaticProductPlaceholderIcon

**Structure**

A view that represents the default placeholder icon for an in-app store product.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor @preconcurrency struct AutomaticProductPlaceholderIcon
```

## Overview

You don’t use this type directly. Instead, create a [doc://com.apple.storekit/documentation/StoreKit/ProductView] or [doc://com.apple.storekit/documentation/StoreKit/StoreView] and provide product identifiers without a custom placeholder icon.

## Conforms To

- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
- View
